Name: Overdrive
About the game: Welcome to Overdrive. Jump into a massive multiplayer experience in either Battle Royale or Assault. Battle Royale: Drop into a 50 player battle royale where the last person standing wins. Loot up and avoid the zone which will eliminate you if you try to escape it. Assault: Gear up for the most action-packed multiplayer experience you will ever play. Assault has modes such as 12v12 Team Deathmatch where the team with the most amount of eliminations within five minutes wins. Respawning is enabled and there are many things to use to your advantage such as the destructible terrain.
Meta Title: Overdrive: Jul 2, 2022, Cody Williams and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Overdrive? Check out the release date (Jul 2, 2022), developer insights from Cody Williams, and a complete game summary.
